name: Angel in My House
description:
Stalked and almost murdered by a girl he rejected three weeks prior, Nagami Kaisei was saved by this peculiar, six-winged guardian angel of his, right before he almost died. Now that he can sees this angel, he realized it really attached to him, and  for some good reason is even worse than the stalker girl because, really, it is his guardian angel, mind you.

"Question: to whom I should write my complain about this situation?"

"I don't know. God, maybe?"

  • Estimated 1.48k words of prologue (*for this demo version only).  This is a very short demo version that cover the prologue of the whole story.

This game contains flashing screen that may triggers epileptic seizure, loud noises, depiction of blood, and aggressive/criminal behavior, such as stalking and attempted murder.

Not suitable for children or people who easily disturbed.

  • Story & Development, Character Spirits, and CG by Ei Kitara (twitter | tumblr | ko-fi)
  • Background Arts by NoraNeko Games and Guttari Nyanko
  • Musics by shimtone and ISAo
